channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Engine Shortages Have Grounded Airlines. This Company Has the Formula to Fix That.
item.description: Being a one-stop shop for leasing, repairs and parts has made FTAI one of the commercial-aviation industry’s few bright spots.

item.title: Bavarian Nordic shares pop over 11% on earnings beat, bumper mpox vaccine order
item.description: Shares of Danish biotech company Bavarian Nordic jumped in early deals Thursday after reporting first-half earnings and a bumper mpox vaccine order.

item.title: Less Is More at Builders FirstSource
item.description: The building-supply giant is growing while shrinking its share count, delighting shareholders.

item.title: Amazon's cloud unit may need to pass the profit growth baton to e-commerce
item.description: Amazon's retail business has "big shoes to fill," according to one Wall Street research firm.

item.title: How Taylor Swift Fans Broke Economics
item.description: Swifties have the same mental biases as the rest of us, making them reluctant to sell even at eye-watering prices.

item.title: Target shares spike as profits rise, despite cautious sales outlook
item.description: The discounter's sales rose as shoppers made more visits to Target's stores and website.

item.title: Schwab Wants to Fix Its Bank. Investors Are Skeptical.
item.description: The brokerage’s playbook of making easy money on customer deposits was upended when interest rates rose rapidly. Now, it is looking to change how it u...

item.title: Macy’s cuts sales forecast as department stores struggle to draw shoppers
item.description: Macy's beat quarterly earnings expectations but it cut its sales forecast for the full year.

item.title: How Inflation and Overspending Are Keeping Gen Z Stuck in a Debt Trap
item.description: A podcast series about how young borrowers got into so much debt so fast and what they can do to manage it.

item.title: T.J. Maxx owner raises full-year guidance, posts 5.6% sales gain for the most recent quarter
item.description: TJX Cos. has taken market share from competitors like Macy's and Target as price-sensitive consumers look for a deal amid persistent inflation.
